text: HRal4 71zly_XTTHRf_4feoror (85v Yae7 &ik <iturf 4A1TY, MRa TaT) National Highways Authority %f India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 0444 T i-5 &d 6, #7e7-10, ERol, # fcrit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Consultancy/2022 Policy Circular No. 10.1.33/2022 dated 25th April, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/ 11013/AEGIE/RFPDocu./2017-Part(2) (Computer No: 13491)} Sub: Technical Capacity provisions in RFPI Bidding of future consultancy assignments for maximum works to be permitted to one consultant-reg: The following amendment to the Policy Guidelines No. 10.1.28/2021 dated 30.03.2021 on Technical Capacity provisions are hereby issued _ The maximum number of works to be permitted to one consultant is restricted a5 per the following ceilings: Sr. Col (2) Col (3) Col (4) Col (5) Col (6) No. 1 Average Annual Turnover of Firm in last 3 Upto More than More than More than Financial Years (from Consultancy Rs. 10 Rs. 10 to Rs. 30 to Rs. 60 Works) Crores Rs. 30 Rs. 60 Crores Crores Crores No_ of professionals on full time rolls 10 25 40 60 (minimum last one year) 3_ Max. no. of projects/ DPR assignments to be 12 25 40 allotted to one particular consultant including ongoing projects at a time in NHAI 4(i) Maximum no. of DPR 12 25 40 Assignments out of those given at Sr.No.3 above 4(ii) Maximum no. of IE/AE assignments (cap of 18 30 75%) out of those given at Sr. No. 3 above Note: (1) Conditions in both Sr. No. & Sr. No. 2 are to be fulfilled to claim maximum no_ of projects given in Sr. No. 3 & 4. (2) In case of JV bidding for the current assignment, the technical capacity of JV will be determined with respect to the weighted average of turnover, professionals & ongoing assignments on the basis of share of consultancy fee in the ongoing assignments and proposed share in the current bid. Refer the illustration at Annex B_ (3) In case any partner of the joint venture has its individual remaining bid capacity less than 0.5 thus making him ineligible for the current bid but, on formation of joint venture; the remaining bid capacity becomes more than 0.5, then during the technical evaluation of the bids, the bids of such JVs will be declared as non-responsive and they will not be allowed to participate in the current assignment: Contd__.2- 9 7 U 9 NHAI T9 , key for key
